title: 为什么管理员上线时会在上一次下线的子服上线
author: 小芒Spring
txt_content:
如题就比如管理员在大厅下线 下一次就在大厅上线 而不是在登录服上线 从而导致authmebungee会让管理员无法上线 因为不在登录服
普通玩家可以在登录服上线 
bc的config里已经设置了进服时需要先进入登录服

求解

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
小芒Spring 发表于 2020-5-17 13:02
listeners:
- query_port: 25565
  motd: '&a&lThis is a good server. :D'
 force_default_server: false
设为true

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content: 把你BC的配置文件发一下

replies.author: 小芒Spring
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-5-17 12:53
把你BC的配置文件发一下
listeners:
- query_port: 25565
  motd: '&a&lThis is a good server. :D'
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  ping_passthrough: false
  priorities:
  - login
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25565
  max_players: 1
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: false
groups:
  md_5:
  - admin
connection_throttle_limit: 3
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.list
  - shoutall.shoutD
  - shoutall.tp
  - parties.command.main
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
  - bungeecord.command.server
log_commands: false
custom_server_name: waterfall-341
network_compression_threshold: 256
timeout: 30000
log_pings: true
always_handle_packets: false
connection_throttle: 4000
online_mode: false
stats: c7650dd0-9b35-4d7c-8692-a06869981070
ip_forward: true
remote_ping_timeout: 5000
remote_ping_cache: -1
server_connect_timeout: 5000
forge_support: true
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
prevent_proxy_connections: false
servers:
  lobby:

    restricted: false
